params.newBaseDebt: the new baseDebt and therefore stake for the user.

returns._0: number of MIMO tokens that the user can claim

params._user: the address of the user for which the MIMO tokens will be released.

baseDebtChanged(address,uint256).notice: Gets called by the `DebtNotifier` and will update the stake of the user to match his current outstanding debt by using his baseDebt.

pendingMIMO(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user can claim via `releaseMIMO`.

releaseMIMO(address).notice: Releases the outstanding MIMO balance to the user.

stake(address).notice: Returns the number of tokens a user has staked.

userInfo(address).notice: Returns the userInfo stored of a user.
